New Records: Maheesh Theekshana broke the record for the most balls faced by a No. 9 batter in a World Cup match with 91 balls
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka added 43 runs for the 10th wicket
Trent Boult picked up 3 wickets for New Zealand
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
